```js
#!/usr/bin/env node

const s = require('storyeng')
let p

p = new s.Part('start')
p.onenter = `Welcome to my story game.`
p.oninput = `Name`

p = new s.Part('Name')
p.onenter = `Name's Norman. What's yours?`
p.oninput = e => {
  e.data.name = e.line
  s.tell('Well, nice to meet you {name}.')
}

s.start()
```
